Recursive function who return a boolean.

Return true if it’s possible to play in this empty cell and false if it’s not possible.

color: int who represents a color, 0 corresponds to black and 1 to white row_index: an int who represents the row postion of the pown in the board column_index: an int who represents the column postion of the pown in the board vector: vector who defines the direction of the move
